00021 
00022 template<typename T1>
00023 class ProxyCube
00024   {
00025   public:
00026   inline ProxyCube(const T1& A)
00027     {
00028     arma_type_check< is_arma_type<T1>::value == false >::apply();
00029     }
00030   };
00031 
00032 
00033 
00034 template<typename eT>
00035 class ProxyCube< Cube<eT> >
00036   {
00037   public:
00038   
00039   typedef eT                                       elem_type;
00040   typedef typename get_pod_type<elem_type>::result pod_type;
00041   typedef Cube<eT>                                 stored_type;
00042   
00043   
00044   const Cube<eT>& Q;
00045   
00046   const u32 n_rows;
00047   const u32 n_cols;
00048   const u32 n_elem_slice;
00049   const u32 n_slices;
00050   const u32 n_elem;
00051   
00052   inline explicit ProxyCube(const Cube<eT>& A)
00053     : Q           (A)
00054     , n_rows      (A.n_rows)
00055     , n_cols      (A.n_cols)
00056     , n_elem_slice(A.n_elem_slice)
00057     , n_slices    (A.n_slices)
00058     , n_elem      (A.n_elem)
00059     {
00060     arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00061     }
00062   
00063   arma_inline elem_type operator[] (const u32 i)                                   const { return Q[i];                  }
00064   arma_inline elem_type at         (const u32 row, const u32 col, const u32 slice) const { return Q.at(row, col, slice); }
00065   };

00069 template<typename T1, typename op_type>
00070 class ProxyCube< OpCube<T1, op_type> >
00071   {
00072   public:
00073   
00074   typedef typename T1::elem_type                   elem_type;
00075   typedef typename get_pod_type<elem_type>::result pod_type;
00076   typedef Cube<elem_type>                          stored_type;
00077   
00078   const Cube<elem_type> Q;
00079   
00080   const u32 n_rows;
00081   const u32 n_cols;
00082   const u32 n_elem_slice;
00083   const u32 n_slices;
00084   const u32 n_elem;
00085   
00086   inline explicit ProxyCube(const OpCube<T1, op_type>& A)
00087     : Q           (A)
00088     , n_rows      (Q.n_rows)
00089     , n_cols      (Q.n_cols)
00090     , n_elem_slice(Q.n_elem_slice)
00091     , n_slices    (Q.n_slices)
00092     , n_elem      (Q.n_elem)
00093     {
00094     arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00095     }
00096   
00097   arma_inline elem_type operator[] (const u32 i)                                   const { return Q[i];                  }
00098   arma_inline elem_type at         (const u32 row, const u32 col, const u32 slice) const { return Q.at(row, col, slice); }
00099   };

00172 template<typename T1, typename eop_type>
00173 class ProxyCube< eOpCube<T1, eop_type > >
00174   {
00175   public:
00176   
00177   typedef typename T1::elem_type                   elem_type;
00178   typedef typename get_pod_type<elem_type>::result pod_type;
00179   typedef eOpCube<T1, eop_type>                    stored_type;
00180   
00181   const eOpCube<T1, eop_type>& Q;
00182   
00183   const u32 n_rows;
00184   const u32 n_cols;
00185   const u32 n_elem_slice;
00186   const u32 n_slices;
00187   const u32 n_elem;
00188   
00189   inline explicit ProxyCube(const eOpCube<T1, eop_type>& A)
00190     : Q           (A)
00191     , n_rows      (A.n_rows)
00192     , n_cols      (A.n_cols)
00193     , n_elem_slice(A.n_elem_slice)
00194     , n_slices    (A.n_slices)
00195     , n_elem      (A.n_elem)
00196     {
00197     arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00198     }
00199   
00200   arma_inline elem_type operator[] (const u32 i)                                   const { return eop_type::get_elem(Q, i);               }
00201   arma_inline elem_type at         (const u32 row, const u32 col, const u32 slice) const { return eop_type::get_elem(Q, row, col, slice); }
00202   };

00206 template<typename T1, typename T2, typename eglue_type>
00207 class ProxyCube< eGlueCube<T1, T2, eglue_type > >
00208   {
00209   public:
00210   
00211   typedef typename T1::elem_type                   elem_type;
00212   typedef typename get_pod_type<elem_type>::result pod_type;
00213   typedef eGlueCube<T1, T2, eglue_type>            stored_type;
00214   
00215   const eGlueCube<T1, T2, eglue_type>& Q;
00216   
00217   const u32 n_rows;
00218   const u32 n_cols;
00219   const u32 n_elem_slice;
00220   const u32 n_slices;
00221   const u32 n_elem;
00222   
00223   inline explicit ProxyCube(const eGlueCube<T1, T2, eglue_type>& A)
00224     : Q           (A)
00225     , n_rows      (A.n_rows)
00226     , n_cols      (A.n_cols)
00227     , n_elem_slice(A.n_elem_slice)
00228     , n_slices    (A.n_slices)
00229     , n_elem      (A.n_elem)
00230     {
00231     arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00232     }
00233   
00234   arma_inline elem_type operator[] (const u32 i)                                   const { return eglue_type::get_elem(Q, i);               }
00235   arma_inline elem_type at         (const u32 row, const u32 col, const u32 slice) const { return eglue_type::get_elem(Q, row, col, slice); }
00236   };
